Physical Properties of Si, SiO2, GaN

Sep 23, 2017

Some basic tables comparing various physical properties of Si, SiO2, GaN etc. for reference.

Property Symbol Si SiO2 GaN Units
Crystal Structure   Diamond Amorphous Wurtzite  
Energy Band Gap 1.12 8 - 9 3.42 eV
Electron Mobility 1400 0 1500 cm2/V.s
Hole Mobility 450 0 30 cm2/V.s
Breakdown Electric Field V/cm
